predicate.note: Frames file for 'term' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No access to verbnet. Comparison to 'call' and 'label'.

roleset.name: assign a label

example.name: passivized
example.text: Reuters Holdings PLC said Michael Reupke resigned as general manager to pursue unspecified interests, a move *trace* the news organization termed *trace* an ``amicable separation.''

roleset.note: I'll bet these always occur in the passive.
